[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards](./opensearch-dashboards.md) &gt; [IUiSettingsClient](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.md)

## IUiSettingsClient interface

Server-side client that provides access to the advanced settings stored in opensearch. The settings provide control over the behavior of the OpenSearch Dashboards application. For example, a user can specify how to display numeric or date fields. Users can adjust the settings via Management UI.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IUiSettingsClient 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.get.md) | &lt;T = any&gt;(key: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;T&gt; | Retrieves uiSettings values set by the user with fallbacks to default values if not specified. |
|  [getAll](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.getall.md) | &lt;T = any&gt;() =&gt; Promise&lt;Record&lt;string, T&gt;&gt; | Retrieves a set of all uiSettings values set by the user with fallbacks to default values if not specified. |
|  [getRegistered](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.getregistered.md) | () =&gt; Readonly&lt;Record&lt;string, [PublicUiSettingsParams](./opensearch-dashboards.publicuisettingsparams.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt; | Returns registered uiSettings values [UiSettingsParams](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.md) |
|  [getUserProvided](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.getuserprovided.md) | &lt;T = any&gt;() =&gt; Promise&lt;Record&lt;string, [UserProvidedValues](./opensearch-dashboards.userprovidedvalues.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;&gt; | Retrieves a set of all uiSettings values set by the user. |
|  [isOverridden](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.isoverridden.md) | (key: string) =&gt; boolean | Shows whether the uiSettings value set by the user. |
|  [remove](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.remove.md) | (key: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Removes uiSettings value by key. |
|  [removeMany](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.removemany.md) | (keys: string\[\]) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Removes multiple uiSettings values by keys. |
|  [set](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.set.md) | (key: string, value: any) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Writes uiSettings value and marks it as set by the user. |
|  [setMany](./opensearch-dashboards.iuisettingsclient.setmany.md) | (changes: Record&lt;string, any&gt;) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt; | Writes multiple uiSettings values and marks them as set by the user. |
